pr_title: HHH-14154 Incorrect SQL generated when concat() and function() methods are used together

timeline.bodyText: Previously no new writer was created and both FORMATDATETIME and || functions share the same writer, thus the strange SQL was created.
timeline.author: NathanQingyangXu

timeline.bodyText: I don't think every DBMS supports this function, so please add a @RequiresDialect(H2Dialect.class)
timeline.author: beikov

replies.bodyText: done. thanks. also added the bug reporter as one of the authors.
replies.author: NathanQingyangXu
